instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Power supply imac 24
threads.message: I have here imac 24 with power supply problem. Are there any common problems with these supply? Big caps 120uF 450V?

threads.title: Power supply imac 24
threads.message: Hopeless to fix, no schematics. Just replace, too cheap to waste time on.

threads.title: Power supply imac 24
threads.message: too cheap? All power in ebay at 150€

threads.title: Power supply imac 24
threads.message: About $100 on Ali. Ebay is going through a fase, someone put the price up and everyone else follows. This shit is 10 years old, no one buys a PSU for E150.
